title.narrative: Improving investment security and transparency by resolving agrarian and natural resource management conflicts in Indonesia

description.narrative: This activity (Improving investment security and transparency by resolving agrarian and natural resource management conflicts in Indonesia) is a component of Forestry, Land-use and Governance in Indonesia reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £2,333,725. This component benefits Indonesia, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration. , with the following implementing partners: World Business Council for Sustainable Development (WBCSD). The start date is 01-04-2015 and the end date is 31-03-2020.

participating-org.narrative: World Business Council for Sustainable Development (WBCSD)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
